room_title: Escape room "The Chicken Wing Sting" by Queen City Escape in Buffalo
review: I made a reservation at QCER for an after-work team building activity, and we had a total blast!We completed the Chicken Wing Sting, and I would totally recommend this place and that particular room to everyone.Domenic was our host - what. a. great. guy.As an added bonus, they also have a great selection of coffee and tea that you can enjoy. room_title: Escape room "The Chicken Wing Sting" by Queen City Escape in Buffalo
review: Totally fun, loved the chicken wing room

room_title: Escape room "The Chicken Wing Sting" by Queen City Escape in Buffalo
review: This was my first experience with an escape room and it was a total blast. Me and a friend did the chicken wing sting, didn't finish on time but still had fun. Can't wait to come back and do the Stranger Things room!
